metadata.title: CVE-2018-5308 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: PoDoFo 0.9.5 does not properly validate memcpy arguments in the PdfMemoryOutputStream::Write function (base/PdfOutputStream.cpp). Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial-of-service or possibly unspecified other impact via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
